context.description: Impact analysis - rename artifact Type the new name of the artifact.
Impact analysis - move artifact Select a new location for the artifact.
Impact analysis results This screen shows artifacts that would be affected by making the changes shown in the 'Operations' panel. Some secondary impacts might not be shown.

topic.label: Artifacts that are excluded from secondary analysis

context.description: Impact analysis preferences Enable and disable indexing through this window. You must enable indexing to perform impact analysis. You can turn off indexing to improve performance. Enabling indexing causes a full build of the index when you save the preference.
